articles.author: Jason Ma
articles.title: US-Japan trade deal gives Trump control over $550 billion. It could be 'vapor ware' - Fortune
articles.description: Analysts at Bank of America said that the Japan deal "looks like a reasonable blueprint" for other auto-exporting countries like South Korea.
articles.content: The pledge from Japan to invest $550 billion in key U.S. industries could show other countries how to clinch a trade deal with the U.S., even as analysts question how real that money is.As part of th… [+4525 chars]
